delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
verify_email: Verify your email to access more features
delete_account_subtitle: Permanently delete your account and all your data
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout from your account?
email_verification_success: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now use all features.
email_not_verified_message: Your email is not verified yet. Please click the verification link in your email.
verification_email_sent: Verification link has been sent to your email.
check_email: Please check your email and click the verification link.
verification_error: An error occurred while checking email verification status. Please try again later.
delete_account_warning: You are about to delete your account. This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently deleted.
photo_source: Where would you like to choose your profile photo from?
access_denied: Access denied. Please check permissions in app settings.
camera_in_use: Camera is being used by another app.
invalid_image: Selected image is invalid or in an unsupported format.
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
photo_updated: Your profile photo has been successfully updated
file_not_found: Selected file not found or not accessible
file_too_large: Selected photo is too large. Please choose a photo smaller than 5MB.
session_expired: Session may have expired, please login again
upload_error: An error occurred while uploading the photo
auth_error: Authorization error: Please login again and try again
storage_full: Storage space is full. Please try again later
connection_error: Connection error: Please check your internet connection and try again
file_size_error: File size exceeds 5MB limit, please select a smaller photo
network_error: Internet connection error. Please check your connection
plant_analysis_desc: Take or upload a clear photo of the plant. AI will provide disease status and recommendations.
choose_photo_source: Choose a method to add your plant photo
photo_ops_desc: What would you like to do with the photo?
select_province_desc: Select the province where the plant is located
enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address
file_not_found_or_accessible: Selected file not found or not accessible
tip_clear_photo: Use photos that clearly show your plant's leaves and stem
tip_good_lighting: Take photos in daylight or under good lighting
tip_focus_disease: If there are disease symptoms, focus on these areas
no_analysis_desc: Tap on the New Analysis card to create your first plant analysis
signup_subtitle: Create an account to use the TatarAI AI agricultural assistant
accept_terms: I accept the terms of use and privacy policy
password_reset_desc: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link:
password_reset_error: An error occurred during the password reset process.
password_reset_link_sent: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your email and click the link to reset your password.
account_deleted_message: Your account and all your data have been successfully deleted.
